content: description from knitty com *as a devotee of creating hand-knitted gifts i tend to run into the same problem every year what can i make with just one skein and half a day i want to knit something practical pretty and looks like it took much longer to make than it did oh yeah and it should be fun to knit tall order not really this headband is a great introduction to entrelac and by the time you ve got it down you re finished any yarn can be used but variegated fibers really shine creating a look of complicated colorwork without changing yarn also my least favorite part of entrelac is the non-public side of the knitting it looks well funny no worries here it doesn t show *
